Beginning 2-6 week surgery , patient undergo external-beam radiotherapy ( EBRT ) day 5 day week 7 week . Patients also receive escalate dos gemcitabine hydrochloride IV begin week EBRT . Patients undergo tissue sample collection periodically correlative study . Samples analyze thymidylate synthase ( TS ) , ribonucleotide reductase ( RR ) , excision-repair-cross-complementing ( ERCC ) -1 protein , deoxycytidine kinase mRNA .
